# An Example

```{r}
wage_data %>%
  tbl_summary()
```

```{r echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

wage_data %>%
  sample_n(size = 100) %>%
  ggplot() +
  aes( x = age, y = wage) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', 
              se = FALSE) +
  geom_smooth(method = 'lm', 
              se = FALSE,
              formula = y ~ poly(x, degree = 3),
              col = 'red') 

```
